학습 팁: There was interference in the signal.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: interference=도움 → X, Q1 동사형? interfere

예문(난이도별 2~3개): The UN intervened in the conflict.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: intervene=무시하다 → X, Q1 명사형? intervention
O, X: intervention=방치 → X, Q1 동사형? intervene

학습 팁: This offer is exclusive to members.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: exclusive=포용적인 → X, Q1 부사형? exclusively

학습 팁: She convinced him that it was true.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: convince=혼란 주다 → X, Q1 형용사형? convinced

예문(난이도별 2~3개): I'm convinced that he is right.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: convinced=의심하는 → X, Q1 반의어? unconvinced
O, X: ensure=위험하게 하다 → X, Q1 동의어? guarantee

학습 팁: This gives a big boost to morale.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: boost=줄이다 → X, Q1 명사형? boost

예문(난이도별 2~3개): He attributes success to hard work.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: attribute A from B → X, Q1 명사형? attribution

예문(난이도별 2~3개): They ascribed the error to luck.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): O, X: ascribe A from B → X, Q1 명사형? ascription
